full_story: One bright morning, Fred burst through the front door, his loud voice echoing, “Guess what, family? I’m going to night classes at Prinstone University to impress Mr. Slate for a raise!” Wilma smiled calmly and said, “That sounds great, Fred! Just remember to be careful.” Pebbles bounced excitedly, “Yay, Daddy! You’ll be the smartest!” As Fred rushed off, Dino wagged his tail, barking happily, “Ruff!” At school, Fred’s impulsive nature led him to join the football team during practice. “I can totally do this!” he shouted, running with the ball. Barney, cheering from the sidelines, called out, “Go, Fred! You can do it!” With a big grin, Fred dodged and weaved, surprising everyone with his skills. “Touchdown!” everyone cheered, including Betty, who hugged Barney and said, “I knew he could do it!” That night, Fred returned home, his face shining with excitement. “I did it! I scored a touchdown!” Wilma hugged him tight, “We’re so proud of you!” Even Mr. Slate, who had come to watch, smiled and said, “Great job, Fred! You’ve earned that raise!” And with Dino jumping around in joy and Pebbles clapping her hands, Fred felt happy, surrounded by the love of his family and friends.

global_characters_dict.Dino: Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting.
global_characters_dict.Betty: Betty is a young woman with a petite frame and soft facial features. She has a slender body with a small waist and long legs. She has a small, oval face with a rounded chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive.
global_characters_dict.Barney: Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Fred: Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Slate: Slate is a bald, older man with a short, stout build. He has no beard or mustache. He has a compact, stocky body with short arms and legs and a round torso. His head is large compared to his body, with a pronounced, square jaw and a small chin. His skin is fair and smooth. Slate has a bald head with only a few thin strands of hair at the back. He wears round, black glasses that make his eyes appear larger. His eyebrows are thin and arched, and he has a prominent nose. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His mouth is wide, often seen smiling and showing his upper teeth. Slate is wearing a sleeveless, olive-green tunic with a jagged hem and a large black necktie. He has round glasses and is barefoot. His outfit is simple and primitive, fitting the stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Wilma: Wilma is a slender woman with a graceful and elegant appearance. She has a slender body with long arms and legs, and her proportions are tall and elegant. Her shoulders are narrow, and her neck is long and thin. She has a small, oval-shaped face and a pointed chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and styled in a high bun with a distinct curl at the front. Her eyebrows are thin and curved, and her eyelashes are short. She has small, round eyes and a small nose. Her lips are red and well-defined. Her ears are small and close to her head. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a chunky white necklace and is barefoot. Her overall look is minimalist and primitive, fitting a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Pebbles: Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.

His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme. Mr. Slate. Slate is a bald, older man with a short, stout build. He has no beard or mustache. He has a compact, stocky body with short arms and legs and a round torso. His head is large compared to his body, with a pronounced, square jaw and a small chin. His skin is fair and smooth. Slate has a bald head with only a few thin strands of hair at the back. He wears round, black glasses that make his eyes appear larger. His eyebrows are thin and arched, and he has a prominent nose. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His mouth is wide, often seen smiling and showing his upper teeth. Slate is wearing a sleeveless, olive-green tunic with a jagged hem and a large black necktie. He has round glasses and is barefoot. His outfit is simple and primitive, fitting the stone-age style.A cheerful office scene where Mr. Slate is congratulating Fred on a job well done creating a sense of accomplishment and positivity. A desk with a computer some papers and a small trophy or certificate representing Freds achievement symbolizing his hard work and the raise he has earned. Fred is standing proudly with a slight smile looking at Mr. Slate while Mr. Slate is leaning slightly forward with a warm smile giving Fred a thumbs-up. Freds face shows a mix of pride and happiness reflecting his satisfaction with his work while Mr. Slates expression is one of encouragement and approval radiating positivity. Fred is positioned slightly to the left in the foreground standing upright with a confident posture while Mr. Slate is in the center leaning over the desk creating a focal point of interaction between them. The setting is an office with light-colored walls a large window letting in natural light and office supplies scattered around contributing to a professional yet friendly atmosphere. Medium shot capturing both Fred and Mr. Slate from the waist up allowing for a clear view of their expressions and the office environment.

captions_info.caption: Dino jumped around in joy, and Pebbles clapped her hands, celebrating Fred’s big achievement!
captions_info.description: Dino. Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting. Pebbles. Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot. Fred. Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.A joyful celebration scene where Dino is energetically jumping around while Pebbles claps her hands in excitement both expressing their happiness for Freds achievement. Dino a large purple dinosaur is the main focus showcasing his playful nature. Pebbles a small girl with bright red hair is also prominent as she enthusiastically claps her hands. Dino is leaping into the air with a big smile his arms raised in delight. Pebbles is standing with her hands together clapping rhythmically her face beaming with joy. Dinos face shows pure joy and excitement with wide eyes and a big toothy grin. Pebbles looks thrilled her eyes sparkling and a bright smile on her face reflecting her happiness. Dino is in the center foreground mid-jump while Pebbles stands slightly to the right closer to the ground creating a dynamic composition. The setting is a cheerful outdoor environment possibly a park or backyard with green grass colorful flowers and a few trees in the background enhancing the celebratory atmosphere. Medium shot capturing both Dinos joyful leap and Pebbles enthusiastic clapping allowing for a clear view of their expressions and the vibrant surroundings.
